title: [GAMEPLAY] blood moon yasuo animations
body:
[GAMEPLAY] blood moon yasuo's ability animations are almost invisable.
the ingame animations for yasuo's q tornado, notification that he can fire a tornado and his w are almost invisable against the background. you have to rely on sound to predict his movements.
settings:
 -resolution, 1920*1080
-full screen mode
-use relative team colors on
-none color blind mode
-eye candy enabled
-graphics very high
-anti aliasing on
-wait for v-sinc off
- no fps cap
- av fsp 100

replies.body:
Hey THAmaxboot! 

Thanks for the report!  Are you referring to the particles for each of the skins here?
it is just the blood moon yasuo skin that i'm aware off. best seen when he is at the edge of the fog of war
Rgr that! Thanks for the additional context.
